mapper.select: SELECT C.APPLY_CODE, C.APPLY_DATE, C.STUDENT_NO, C.CHANGE_SDEPT, C.STATUS, C.DONE_DATE, C.BEFORE_MAJOR, C.REASON, O.COLLEGE_NAME, I.GRADE, I.AVG_SCORE, M.MEMBER_KNAME, D.SDEPT_NAME AS CHANGE_NAME, P.SDEPT_NAME FROM CHANGE_MAJOR C JOIN SDEPARTMENT D ON(C.CHANGE_SDEPT = D.SDEPT_CODE) JOIN COLLEGE O ON(D.COLLEGE_CODE = O.COLLEGE_CODE) JOIN STUDENT_INFO I ON(C.STUDENT_NO = I.STUDENT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.STUDENT_NO = M.MEMBER_ID) JOIN SDEPARTMENT P ON(C.BEFORE_MAJOR = P.SDEPT_CODE) WHERE C.STUDENT_NO = #{studentNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHANGE_MAJOR (APPLY_CODE, APPLY_DATE, STUDENT_NO, CHANGE_SDEPT, STATUS, DONE_DATE, BEFORE_MAJOR, REASON) VALUES ('CM'||SEQ_CHANGEMAJOR.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{studentNo}, (SELECT SDEPT_CODE FROM SDEPARTMENT WHERE SDEPT_NAME = #(changeSdeptName)), '신청', NULL, (SELECT SDEPT_CODE FROM SDEPARTMENT WHERE SDEPT_NAME = #(beforeMajorName)), NULL)
